answers.answer: Hello,Yeast of fungal infection love humidity and moisture and it can be due to moisture (due to sweating or frequent washing), the abrasion caused by clothing, the pressure of sitting, chemical irritants like laundry soaps, colognes and scented toilet paper. the other possibility is that it can be due to other skin conditions like eczema, incomplete treatment, treatment resistance , co-existing dermatitis, diabetes and low immunity.Firstly we need to confirm whether this is fungal infection or other skin causes like eczema and dermatitis.
